mil3.7.13:0.3: Question on the One Taste of the Sea
mil3.7.13:1.2: “Venerable Nāgasena, why does the sea have just one taste, the taste of salt?”
mil3.7.13:1.3: “The sea has just one taste, the taste of salt, your majesty, because it has been around a long time.”
mil3.7.13:3.1: Question on the One Taste of the Sea thirteenth
